00075 void CompactTriples::console() {
00076     vector < string > subcommand;
00077     string command;
00078     char commandChar[256];
00079 
00080     string format = "ntriples";
00081     string output = "salida.rdf";
00082     int i = 0;
00083 
00084     cout.precision(4);
00085     cout << endl << "**************************" << endl;
00086     cout << "  Compact Triples Console" << endl;
00087     cout << "  ---------------------" << endl;
00088 
00089     while (true) {
00090         format = "ntriples";
00091         output = "output.rdf";
00092 
00093         cout << "  Available Operations: " << endl;
00094         cout
00095                 << "        serialize                      Serialize HDT to RDF (ntriples by default). "
00096                 << endl;
00097         cout
00098                 << "            -f format                         Output format: ntriples (default), rdfxml, turtle, rdfxml-abbrev, rdfxml-xmp, atom, json-triples, json, dot"
00099                 << endl;
00100         cout
00101                 << "            -o --output <file>                Serialize output (output.rdf by default)"
00102                 << endl;
00103         cout << "        help                           Show this help" << endl;
00104         cout << "        exit                           Exit console mode"
00105                 << endl;
00106 
00107         cout << "**************************" << endl;
00108         cout << endl;
00109         cout << "\n\n$>";
00110 
00111         cin.getline(commandChar, 256);
00112         command = commandChar;
00113 
00114         if (command == "")
00115             cout << "\n Please provide one available command.\n\n";
00116         else {
00117             //split as space separator
00118             stringExplode(command, " ", &subcommand);
00119 
00120             if (subcommand[0] == "serialize") {
00121 
00122                 for (i = 1; i < subcommand.size();) {
00123                     //verify arguments              
00124                     if (subcommand[i] == "-f") {
00125 
00126                         i = i + 1;
00127                         if (i < (subcommand.size())) {
00128                             if (subcommand[i][0] != '-') //other option
00129                             {
00130                                 format = subcommand[i];
00131                                 if (format != "ntriples" && format != "turtle"
00132                                         && format != "rdfxml-xmp" && format
00133                                         != "rdfxml-abbrev" && format
00134                                         != "rdfxml" && format != "rss-1.0"
00135                                         && format != "atom" && format != "dot"
00136                                         && format != "rss-1.0" && format
00137                                         != "json-triples" && format != "json") {
00138                                     cout << "<WARNING> The format:" << format
00139                                             << " is possibly not allowed by the serializer.\n\n";
00140                                 }
00141                                 i = i + 1;
00142                             }
00143                         }
00144                     } else if (subcommand[i] == "-o") {
00145                         i = i + 1;
00146                         if (i < (subcommand.size())) {
00147                             if (subcommand[i][0] != '-') //other option
00148                             {
00149                                 output = subcommand[i];
00150                                 i = i + 1;
00151                             }
00152                         }
00153                     } else
00154                         i = i + 1;
00155                 }
00156                 DataTime t1, t2;
00157                 getTime(&t1);
00158                 bool ok = serialize((char*) output.c_str(),
00159                         (char*) format.c_str());
00160                 getTime(&t2);
00161                 if (ok) {
00162                     cout << "   <OK> The file '" << output
00163                             << " has been successfully created in ";
00164                     cout << t2.user - t1.user << " seconds." << endl << endl;
00165                 }
00166             } else if (subcommand[0] == "exit") {
00167                 exit(0);
00168             } else if (subcommand[0] == "help") {
00169                 //nothing to do
00170             } else {
00171                 cout << "\n" << subcommand[0] << ": command not found.\n\n";
00172             }
00173         }
00174         subcommand.clear();
00175     }
00176 }

00181 bool CompactTriples::transformToN3() {
00182     unsigned int x = 1, y, z;
00183     size_t read_y = 0, read_z = 0;
00184     string subject, predicate, object;
00185     TripleID triple;
00186 
00187     string input = path;
00188     FILE *fileY = fopen((input.append(".hdt.triples.Y")).c_str(), "r");
00189 
00190     input = path;
00191     FILE *fileZ = fopen((input.append(".hdt.triples.Z")).c_str(), "r");
00192 
00193     string output = path;
00194     output.append(".fromHDT.n3");
00195     ofstream outFile(output.c_str());
00196 
00197     unsigned int i = 1;
00198 
00199     while (i <= ntriples) {
00200         read_y += fread(&y, INT32, 1, fileY);
00201 
00202         // Check if the current 'y' value marks (with 0) the end of an
00203         // adjacency list in X
00204         if (y == 0) {
00205             // Increment 'x' value and read a new 'y' value
00206             x++;
00207             read_y += fread(&y, INT32, 1, fileY);
00208         }
00209 
00210         // Retrieve the adjacency list of (x,y)
00211         read_z += fread(&z, INT32, 1, fileZ);
00212 
00213         while (z != 0) {
00214             triple = retrieveTriple(x, y, z);
00215 
00216             subject = dictionary->retrieveString(triple.x, VOC_SUBJECT);
00217             predicate = dictionary->retrieveString(triple.y, VOC_PREDICATE);
00218             object = dictionary->retrieveString(triple.z, VOC_OBJECT);
00219 
00220             outFile << subject << " " << predicate << " " << object << " ."
00221                     << endl;
00222 
00223             i++;
00224             read_z += fread(&z, INT32, 1, fileZ);
00225         }
00226     }
00227     return true;
00228 }

00235 bool CompactTriples::serialize(char *output, char *format) {
00236     unsigned int x = 1, y, z;
00237     RDFSyntaxMediator rdfmediator;
00238     ofstream outFile;
00239 
00240     bool n3 = true;
00241     if (strcmp(format, "ntriples") != 0) {
00242         n3 = false;
00243         rdfmediator.init_serialize(output, format);
00244     } else {
00245         outFile.open(output);
00246     }
00247 
00248     size_t read_y = 0, read_z = 0;
00249     string subject, predicate, object;
00250     TripleID triple;
00251 
00252     string input = path;
00253     FILE *fileY = fopen((input.append(".hdt.triples.Y")).c_str(), "r");
00254 
00255     input = path;
00256     FILE *fileZ = fopen((input.append(".hdt.triples.Z")).c_str(), "r");
00257 
00258     unsigned int i = 1;
00259 
00260     while (i <= ntriples) {
00261         read_y += fread(&y, INT32, 1, fileY);
00262 
00263         // Check if the current 'y' value marks (with 0) the end of an
00264         // adjacency list in X
00265         if (y == 0) {
00266             // Increment 'x' value and read a new 'y' value
00267             x++;
00268             read_y += fread(&y, INT32, 1, fileY);
00269         }
00270 
00271         // Retrieve the adjacency list of (x,y)
00272         read_z += fread(&z, INT32, 1, fileZ);
00273 
00274         while (z != 0) {
00275             triple = retrieveTriple(x, y, z);
00276 
00277             subject = dictionary->retrieveString(triple.x, VOC_SUBJECT);
00278             predicate = dictionary->retrieveString(triple.y, VOC_PREDICATE);
00279             object = dictionary->retrieveString(triple.z, VOC_OBJECT);
00280 
00281             //outFile 
00282             if (n3 == true) {
00283                 outFile << subject << " " << predicate << " " << object << " ."
00284                         << endl;
00285             } else {
00286                 rdfmediator.serialize_statement(subject, predicate, object);
00287             }
00288 
00289             i++;
00290             read_z += fread(&z, INT32, 1, fileZ);
00291         }
00292     }
00293 
00294     if (n3 == true) {
00295         if (outFile.good())
00296             outFile.close();
00297     } else
00298         rdfmediator.end_serialize();
00299 
00300     return true;
00301 }

00308 unsigned int CompactTriples::write(vector<TripleID> &graph, string path) {
00309     string output = path;
00310     FILE *fileY = fopen((output.append(".hdt.triples.Y")).c_str(), "w+");
00311 
00312     output = path;
00313     FILE *fileZ = fopen((output.append(".hdt.triples.Z")).c_str(), "w+");
00314 
00315     unsigned int repeated = 0;
00316     unsigned int x = graph[0].x, y = graph[0].y, z = 0;
00317 
00318     fwrite(&y, INT32, 1, fileY);
00319 
00320     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < graph.size(); i++) {
00321         if (x == graph[i].x) {
00322             if (y == graph[i].y) {
00323                 if (z != graph[i].z) {
00324                     z = graph[i].z;
00325                     fwrite(&z, INT32, 1, fileZ);
00326                 } else {
00327                     repeated++;
00328                 }
00329             } else {
00330                 // Change of Y coordinate: write a 0 in the stream Z
00331                 y = 0;
00332                 fwrite(&y, INT32, 1, fileZ);
00333 
00334                 y = graph[i].y;
00335                 z = graph[i].z;
00336 
00337                 fwrite(&y, INT32, 1, fileY);
00338                 fwrite(&z, INT32, 1, fileZ);
00339             }
00340         } else {
00341             // Change of X and Y coordinates: write both 0s in stream Y,Z
00342             x = 0;
00343             y = 0;
00344 
00345             fwrite(&x, INT32, 1, fileY);
00346             fwrite(&y, INT32, 1, fileZ);
00347 
00348             x = graph[i].x;
00349             y = graph[i].y;
00350             z = graph[i].z;
00351 
00352             fwrite(&y, INT32, 1, fileY);
00353             fwrite(&z, INT32, 1, fileZ);
00354         }
00355     }
00356 
00357     x = 0;
00358     fwrite(&x, INT32, 1, fileY);
00359     y = 0;
00360     fwrite(&y, INT32, 1, fileZ);
00361 
00362     fclose(fileY);
00363     fclose(fileZ);
00364 
00365     return graph.size() - repeated;
00366 }
00367 
00372 unsigned int CompactTriples::write(string path) {
00373     return CompactTriples::write(this->graph, path);
00374 }
